alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 3:51AM CDT until June 19 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dallas County in south central Alabama... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 350 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Central Mills, or 14 miles south of Uniontown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Orrville, Belknap, Tyler, Central Mills, Dallas Lake, Old Cahaba Park, Dannelly Reservoir, Tilden, Whites Bluff, Carlowville, Safford, Hazen, Minter, Craig Field Aiport and Crumptonia. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for south central and central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
